subtitle: chapter 31 an interview with the sacred
mother Reverend Mother I was baptized in
infancy by a prophet husband he was the
Guru of my parents and my guru Sri
Yukteswar J will you therefore give me
the privilege of hearing a few incidents
in your sacred life I was addressing
Srimati Kashi Moni the life companion of
Larry masa finding myself in Banaras for
a short period I was fulfilling long
felt desire to visit the venerable lady
she received me graciously at the old
Lahiri homestead in the guard schwa
Mahalo
section of Banaras although a did she
was blooming like a lotus silently
emanated a spiritual fragrance she was
of medium build with a slender neck and
fair skin large Luster's I softened her
motherly faith son you are welcome here
come upstairs Kashi Moni led the way to
a very small room where for a time she
had lived with her husband I felt
honored to witness a shrine in which the
peerless master had condescended to play
the human drama of matrimony the gentle
lady motioned me to a pillow seat by her
side it was years before I came to
realize the divine stature my husband
she began one night in his very room I
had a vivid dream glories angels floated
in unimaginable grace above me so
realistic was a sight that I woke at
once the room was strangely enveloped in
dazzling light my husband and lotus
posture was levitated in the center of
the room surrounded by angels who were
worshipping him with the supplicating
dignity of palm folded hands astonished
beyond measure I was convinced that I
was still dreaming woman Larry Masha
said you are not dreaming forsake your
sleep forever and forever as he slowly
descended to the floor I prostrated
myself at his feet master I cried again
and again I bow before thee will you
pardon me for having considered you as
my husband I died with shame to realize
that I've remained asleep in ignorance
by the sight of one who so divinely
awakened from this night you are no
longer my husband
but my guru will you accept my
insignificant self as your disciple the
master touched me gently sacred soul
arise you are accepted he motioned
toward the angels please bow and turn to
each of these holy Saints when I
finished my humble genuflect and the
angelic voices sounded together like a
chorus from an ancient scripture consort
of the divine one the heart blessed we
salute thee they bowed at my feet and lo
their refulgent forms vanished for the
room darkened my guru asked me to
receive initiation into Kriya yoga of
course I responded I am sorry not to
have had its blessing earlier in life
the time was not right Larry Masha
smiled consoling me much of your karma I
have silently helped you work out now
you are willing and ready he touched my
forehead masses of whirling light
appeared the radiance gradually formed
itself into an Opel blue spear July
ringed in gold and centered with a white
pentagonal star penetrate your
consciousness through the star into the
kingdom of the infinite my gurus voice
had a new note soft like distant music
vision after vision broke as oceanic
surf on the shores of my soul the
panoramic spheres finally melted in a
sea of bliss I lost myself an ever
surging blessedness when I returned
hours later to awareness of this world
the master gave me the technique of
Kriya yoga from that night on Lorie
Masha never slept in my room again nor
thereafter did he ever sleep he remained
in the front room downstairs and the
company of his disciples both by day and
by night the illustrious lady fell into
silence realising the end uniqueness of
a relationship with sublime yogi I
finally ventured to ask for further arm
essences son you are greedy nevertheless
you have one more story she smiled shyly
I will confess the sin which I have
committed against my guru husband some
months after my initiation I began to
feel forlorn and neglected one morning
luring Masha entered this little room to
fetch an article
I quickly followed him overcome by
violent delusion I had dressed him skate
early you spend all your time with the
disciples what about your
responsibilities for your wife and
children
I regret that you do not interest
yourself in providing more money for the
family
the master glanced at me for a moment
then lo he was gone
odd and frightened I heard a voice
resounding from every part of the room
it is all nothing don't you see how
could a nothing like me produce riches
for you guru ji I cried I implore pardon
a million times my sinful eyes can see
you no more please appear in your sacred
form I am here this reply came from
above me I looked up and saw the master
materialize in the air his head touching
the ceiling his eyes were like blinding
flames besides myself with Fiorelli
sobbing on his feet after he had quietly
descended to the floor woman he said
seek divine wealth not the paltry tinsel
on earth after acquiring inward treasure
you will find that outward supply as
always forthcoming he added one of my
spiritual sons will make provisions for
you my gurus words naturally came true a
disciple did leave a considerable sum
for our family I thank Kashi Moni for
sharing with me her wondrous experience
on the following day I returned her home
enjoyed several hours of philosophical
discussion with tin Corey and Duke or
ela hurry these two saintly sons of
India's great yogi followed closely in
his ideal footsteps both men were fair
tall stalwart and heavily bearded with
soft voices in an old-fashioned charm of
manner his wife was not the only woman
disciple of Larry Masha there were
hundreds of others including my mother a
woman cheetah once asked the Guru for
his photograph he handed her a print
remarking if you deem it a protection
than it is so otherwise it is only a
picture a few days later this woman and
larry masters daughter-in-law happened
to be studying the bhagavad-gita at a
table behind which hung the guru's
photograph an electrical storm broke out
with great fury
Lari Masha protect us the woman bowed
before the picture lightning struck the
book which she had been reading but the
two devotees were unhurt I felt as
though a sheet of ice had been placed
around me to ward off the scorching heat
that she'll explained
Larry Masha performed two miracles in
connection with a woman disciple of Hoya
she and her husband a calcutta lawyer
started one day for Bernard to visit the
Guru their carriage was delayed by heavy
traffic they reached the horrid main
station only to hear the Banaras train
whistling for departure a boy at near
the ticket office stood quietly Larry
Masha I beseech you to stop the train
she's silently prayer
I cannot suffer the pangs of delay and
waiting another day to see thee the
wheels of the snorting trend continued
to move round and round but there was no
onward progress the engineering
passengers descended to the platform to
view the phenomena an English railroad
guard approached a boy and her husband
contrary to all precedent he volunteered
his services Babu he said give me the
money I will buy your tickets while you
get aboard as soon as the couple was
seated and he'd receive the tickets the
train slowly moved forward in panic the
engineering passengers clamoring again
to their places knowing neither how the
train started know why it had stopped in
the first place arriving at the home of
Larry Martian Banaras a boy has silently
prostrated herself before the master and
tried to touch his feet compose yourself
a boy marked how you love to bother me
as if you could not come here by the
next train a boy visited Larry Masha on
another memorable occasion this time she
wanted his intercession not with a train
but with the stork I pray you to bless
me that my ninth child may live she said
eight babies have been born to me
all died soon after birth the master
smiled sympathetically you're coming
child will live please follow my
instructions carefully the baby a girl
will be born at night see that the oil
lamp is kept burning until dawn do not
fall asleep I must allow the light
become extinguished a boyars child was a
daughter born at night exactly is
foreseen by the omniscient guru the
mother instructed her nurse to keep the
lamp filled with oil both women kept the
urgent vigil far into the early morning
hours but finally fell asleep the lamp
oil was almost gone the light flickered
feebly the bedroom door unlatched and
flew open with a violent sound the
startled woman to walk there astonished
eyes beheld the form of Lara Masha a boy
a behold the light is almost gone he
pointed to the lamp which the nurse
hastened to refill as soon as it burned
again brightly the master vanished the
door closed the latch was affixed
without visible agency a boy's ninth
child survived in 1935 when I made an
inquiry she was still living one of
Larry Marcia's disciples the venerable
collie kuma ROI related to me many
fascinating details of his life with the
master I was often a guest at his
Banaras home for weeks at a time Roy
told me I observed that many saintly
figures Donda Swami's arrived in the
quiet of the night to sit at the guru's
feet sometimes they would engage in
discussion of meditational and
philosophical points at dawn the exalted
guests would depart I found her in my
visit to Larry Masha - now once lay down
to sleep during an early period of my
association with the master I had to
contend with the opposition of my
employer Roy went on he was steeped in
materialism
I don't want religious fanatics on my
staff he would snare if I ever meet your
charlatan guru I shall give him some
words to remember this alarming threat
failed to interpret my regular program I
spent nearly every evening my gurus
present one night my employer followed
me and rushed rudely into the parlour he
was doubtless fully bent on uttering the
pulverizing remarks he had promised no
sooner had the man seated himself that
Larry Masha addressed the little group
of about 12 disciples would you all like
to see a picture when we nodded he asked
us to dark in the room sit behind one
in a circle he said and place your hands
over the eyes of the man in front of you
I was not surprised to see that my
employer also was following albeit
unwilling the master directions in a few
minutes Larry masa asked us what we were
seeing sir I replied a beautiful woman
appears she wears a red boarded sari and
stands near an elephant ear plant all
the other disciples gave the same
description the master turned my
employer do you recognize that woman yes
the man was evidently struggling with
emotion suit new to his nature I have
been foolishly spending my money on her
though I have a good wife I am ashamed
of the motive which brought me here will
you forgive me and receive me as a
disciple if you lead a good moral life
for six months I shall accept you the
master enigmatically added otherwise I
won't have to initiate you for three
months my employer refrained from
temptation then he resumed his former
relationship with a woman two months
later he died thus I came to understand
my gurus veil of prophecy about the
improbability of the man's initiation
Larry Masha had a very famous friend
swami sri lanka who was reputed to be
over 300 years old the two Yogi's often
sat together in meditation
Turrell unga's fame is so widespread
that few Hindus who deny the possibility
of truth in any story of astounding
miracles
if Christ returned to Earth and walked
the streets of New York displaying his

crowded lanes of Banaras
on many occasions as Swami was seen to
drink with no ill effect the most deadly

few who are still living have seen to
illunga floating on the Ganges for days
together he would sit on top of the
water or remain hidden for very long

the in son
by these feats Turanga sought to teach
men that a Yogi's life does not depend

the yogi was great not only spiritually

pounds a pound for each year of his life
as he eat very seldom the mystery is

ignores all usual rules of Health when

alumina masters have long passed from

the harassed police of Banaras came to

the natural Swami like the early Adam in

his cell still securely lock offered no
clue to his motive a scale the
discouraged officers of the law
once more perform their duty this time a

might again retired before Wright
terlingua was soon observed in his

is blind
the outwitted police decided to follow

trilinga ate only occasionally after
weeks without food he would break his
fast with
of clabber to him by devotees a skeptic

please drink it
try Linga unhesitatingly drained to the

well purged sinner healed by trilling
his words slunk feebly away the reversal

swinging arm men of God realization like

joy

Larry Masha is like a divine kitten
